ModMetaData.name: Show Hair Under Stuff
ModMetaData.author: Raccoon Cuddler
ModMetaData.description:
Prevent your pawn from going bald when wearing a hat.
2 features: - Show hair under "Upper HeadGear" (like hats) - Show hair and beards under "Full HeadGear" (like marine armor helmets)
Each one is on by default, but they can individually be turned off.
